message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm still interested in the product, but I'd like to get it at a price that's more within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand that $95 is a bit of a stretch for me, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $105. This is as low as I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'd be willing to pay $98 for the product, as it's a good price for me. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
